html:
Lest any hurt it, I will keep it night and day - "I will take care of her by night; and by day I will keep guard over her"— ,For ,יפקד פן ,pen yiphkod ,, lest any visit it, the Syriac read ,ואפקד ,veephkod ,, and I will visit it. Twenty MSS. of Kennicott's, fourteen of De Rossi's, and two of my own, and six editions read ,אפקד ,ephkod ,, I will visit, in the first person.

,
